dcterms:creator: Djamé Seddah
Sandra Kübler
Reut Tsarfaty
dcterms:description: Benchmark dataset for Hebrew morphological segmentation based on the Hebrew Treebank, containing approximately 94K super-tokens for training and 21K for testing and development.
dcterms:title: SPMRL shared task data for Hebrew

dcterms:creator: Rami Al-Rfou
Vivek Kulkarni
Bryan Perozzi
Steven Skiena
dcterms:description: A new out-of-domain dataset constructed from Hebrew Wikipedia NER data, consisting of 5,000 super-tokens representing shuffled sentences from a wide range of topics.
dcterms:title: Wiki5K
